news.title: Former Sequoia partner’s new startup uses AI to negotiate your calendar for you
news.summary: Blockit, an AI agent that communicates directly with other calendars, has raised $5 million in seed funding led by Sequoia.

news.title: Palmer Luckey says the coolest thing about Anduril expanding to Long Beach is the fighter jets
news.summary: Anduril on Thursday announced its plans to expand its Southern California presence with a major campus in Long Beach, the town where founder Palmer Luckey grew up.

news.title: OpenAI is coming for those sweet enterprise dollars in 2026
news.summary: OpenAI has reportedly appointed Barret Zoph to lead its push into enterprise just a week after Zoph rejoined the company.

news.title: Vimeo starts layoffs after acquisition by Bending Spoons
news.summary: Vimeo is in the process of laying off some of its global staff after being acquired last year by Bending Spoons for $1.38B.

news.title: GM to end Chevy Bolt EV production next year, move China-made Buick to US factory
news.summary: The factory musical chairs reflect an economic and political environment, shaped by the Trump administration's tariff policy and its decision to end the federal EV tax credit.

news.title: Google won’t stop replacing our news headlines with terrible AI
news.summary: In early December, I brought you the news that Google has begun replacing Verge headlines, and those of our competitors, with AI clickbait nonsense in its content feed. news.title: Microsoft Paint can now make AI coloring books
news.summary: Microsoft is giving its Paint and Notepad apps on Windows new AI capabilities for editing text and making digital illustrations. news.title: The TikTok deal is done, finally
news.summary: Just over a year after it briefly disappeared from app stores, TikTok in the US is now part of a new entity, TikTok USDS Joint Venture LLC. news.title: Ring can verify videos now, but that might not help you with most AI fakes
news.summary: Ring has launched a new Ring Verify tool that the company says can "verify that Ring videos you receive haven't been edited or changed." news.title: No, the Freecash App Won’t Pay You to Scroll TikTok
news.summary: Freecash will actually pay money out to users but not for watching videos. This misleading marketing coincides with the app’s rising popularity.

news.summary: We Are Rewind’s speaker/cassette player combo is an imperfect but satisfying reissue of a bygone audio era.

news.title: 149 Million Usernames and Passwords Exposed by Unsecured Database
news.summary: This “dream wish list for criminals” includes millions of Gmail, Facebook, banking logins, and more. The researcher who discovered it suspects they were collected using infostealing malware.

news.title: Sorry MAGA, Turns Out People Still Like ‘Woke’ Art
